website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, well-received deep dish pan with few, if any, critics.
cons: Pan may be scratched by pizza cutter (remove pizza before cutting to avoid this)

customer_reviews.title: Had to change my review after a cheese incident
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to edit my review and post some pictures. I was initially impressed by this pan. However after one pizza cheese mishap, scrubbing with paper towels and washing 3 times in the dishwasher, this non stick pan is stuck on dirty mode. As seen in the pictures, it's not coming clean! A non stick pizza pan should at least be able to handle a little spilled mozzarella! Went from 4 star to 2 ..and after I bought 3 of them. Getting good better pan next time.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Make pizza, make the world a better place.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deep dish pan, I used it to make stuffed pizza. You could use it for pies and other pastries too
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: The crust was not as crisp as I had with my cast iron skillet. That is probably my mistake. I should have had the heat at 475. This pan gives a larger pizza, and using the same amount of ingredients as the 12 inch cast iron, it isn't a true"deep dish" However, I save myself a considerable amount of wrist and arm discomfort, as I had to change because the cast iron is too heavy for me these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coating, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This pan is absolutely enormous. If you manage to fill this pan with pizza, it would feed an army. Very nice coating, easy to clean, non-stick. Recommend putting parchment paper under the pizza and using that to lift the pizza out after cooking before cutting. Rolling cutters will fairly quickly chip away at the coating on the pan and reduce it's lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: V91-Bleach

customer_reviews.title: Deep dish pizza baby !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deep dish pizza pan. All you need is 3 tablespoons of oil in the pan and a dough ball weight of 630 grams and you're set. I'm glad I purchased this and I would recommend it to all. I'm really a thin crust pizza kind of guy but this pan makes it delicious baked / fried pizza crust that is absolutely delicious. The oil in the pan makes all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: tackless

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pizza Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pan. Always have very good results when I make Chicago Style deep dish pizza. Always has a great color distribution. This 14" pan creates a huge pizza.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorMasterBlaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than anticipated--make sure you consider that a 14" deep dish is a TON of food (and may require more dough than usual). At the end of the day, though--this Pan has made me a deep dish gourmet! Cooks cleanly and evenly every time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected / substantial pan.
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I measured wrong, but in a good way. This pan is much larger than I expected. It provides great heat distribution with a deep dish pizza crust. Nothing raw or burnt! I've also used this as a backup to make biscuits and cookies. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: great, but they sent FOUR..
customer_reviews.text: I have tied to reach out to find out how to return the other 3, IF anyone from amazon or the dist reads this, please reach out to me. THANKS!!! The pizza I made last night was super!!
customer_reviews.author: lauras50

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY CHICAGO BAKEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my only pizza pan..actually I have 2 of these and I love everything about it, the durability of all the Chicago bakeware means everything! Love how it cooks evenly every single time, and let’s not forget the nonstick factor ....it’s so amazing!
customer_reviews.author: 2PacNipHusslePopSmokeMyLuvz!

customer_reviews.title: Make some Chicago deep dish pizza!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are of nice quality. They are pretty large and pizza crust simply does not stick to it. I have used this on a pizza stone and just on the rack, and it works quite well either way. Admittedly, these are my first deep-dish pizza pans, so I don't have a lot to compare them to, but they work exactly like you'd expect for the pan -- they hold your pizza while it's cooking and release the pizza when it's done so that you can get it out to serve without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve973

customer_reviews.title: Even heat / non-stick / Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a stuffed Chicago pizza (Tony Gemignani recipe from the Pizza Bible). Baked 30 minutes at 475*F. Perfect crust, easily(!) slid out of the pan onto cutting board. No sticking / no residue whatsoever. Light soapy wipe to clean. HIGHLY recommend this pan for this style of pizza. Expect it to work well for chicken pot pie.
customer_reviews.author: CAL WineGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my pizza-loving husband and it did not disappoint! He already made a Pizza Hut copy cat deep dish and was very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Great nonstick but dents easily
customer_reviews.text: This pan dents easily. As long as you’re careful it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in perfect condition, and allows me to make quality deep ...
customer_reviews.text: This pizza pan is exactly what I was looking for when purchasing a deep dish pan. It arrived in perfect condition, and allows me to make quality deep dish pizzas at home. The non-stick coating is perfect, but vulnerable to piecing using a pizza cutter. Make sure you don't cut the pizza in the pan, and it will last you years. I had though the non-stick coating would be more durable and allow me to cut the pizza in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended but not highly It is not heavy duty, very light and not Easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: Zafer E.

customer_reviews.title: Versatility pan
customer_reviews.text: Got this pan yesterday to give me variety baking options not just deep dish pizza. Made a huge quiche with EVERYTHING one would want in a killer quiche. Had to bake it 10-12 minutes longer than the instructions said. It looked like a magazine photo and tasted great. I really like what this pan allows me to do. Baking for large groups. Seems to be good quality so I happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline C.

customer_reviews.title: These pans are great for Chicago Deep Dish
customer_reviews.text: The pizza slides right out. Very easy to clean. They make me look like a professional pizza pie chef.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Makes great pizza
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pan. The first one has been used for a few years and is still in great shape. It is the perfect size for the dough we buy at Publix. Pizzas come out great at 475 with no sticking problems.
customer_reviews.author: billfish

customer_reviews.title: but have since found this is great at baking those frozen french fries
customer_reviews.text: bought this originally for baking pizzas, but have since found this is great at baking those frozen french fries. previously when we baked store-bought frozen fries, they always turned out kind of soggy, not crispy. This pan made a huge difference, now the fries are turning out very crispy. very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ycarol

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Sturdy and easy to clean. Perfect for making deep pan pizzas at home.
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: I got the 16”  Too big for me.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a really good pan. I have not used it yet but it is heavy, just like the commercial ones, not the light ones in the stores. 16" is wicked big. I will buy a smaller one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness and easy clean are number 1.
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, sturdy, cleans easily and I use it when I smoke my meat outside.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I may never go out for pizza again, it’s fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Megh C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Very Good Heat Distribution
customer_reviews.text: I use this deep dish for cooking a variety of foods. It is very sturdy and the food cooks equally.
customer_reviews.author: david a yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pan for pizza night!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pan, great for homemade pizza. Ever since I got a bread maker last yearI've been trying different pizza recipes and my boys LOVE pizza night each week. I do a recipe with four cups of flour for a nice thick deep dish pizza, or cut it in half and make a thinner crust but do bread sticks in another pan. This pan is good for bread sticks too; they don't stick and cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: FW Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! Can't say enough good things about it, quality and even heat distribution for great crust as well. I cook 2-3 homemade deep dish pizzas a week and this pan hasn't stuck once. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: YUMBO Pizza Maker
customer_reviews.text: This pan has helped me clean out my refrigerator, every friday night and make the most wonderful pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Cave Bear

customer_reviews.title: Dat's a niceeee pizza!
customer_reviews.text: I've been making regular pizzas for years and wanted to branch out into the Chicago style pizza. This pan allowed me to do that. While preparation takes a bit longer than your average pizza, and also requires more ingredients, I was satisfied with the overall result. I would suggest maybe a smaller pan if you're not quite ready to go all in, but still no complaints about this particular pan. Did what it was suppose to and provided my wife and I with one hefty delicious meal!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Dougals

customer_reviews.title: Over priced cheepie
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was a carbon steel pan,however it is your average pan(say from Walmart)that is overpriced!!! Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: Too big for frozen puzzas
customer_reviews.text: We mostly heat up frozen pizzas and this is far too big for one of those. However, at least it’s non-stick, which is far better than the last one we had that kept getting all hunky.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Professional all the way.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and heavy duty. You cannot go wrong with these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this so easy to clean! Love making pizza with my grandchildren. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: P Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pan. I actually bought this to make an extra large key lime pie for Thanksgiving and it worked out really well. The pie crust was evenly and thoroughly cooked and the size was just right for a family.
customer_reviews.author: Kai DC

customer_reviews.title: great pan!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for deep dish pizzas. I used a homemade yeast crust and it came out wonderful. I would recommend getting a very wide spatula to help get the pizza put of the pan however because of the weight of the pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pan
customer_reviews.text: What a great pan, I love my Deep Dish pizza and this pan has not failed me yet, DO NOT CUT in it take the dang pizza out of it before cutting. Its non stick not even cheese has had to be scrapped out of this. I love it so much I will be ordering a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making nachos!
customer_reviews.text: I don't make homemade pizza BUT we love nachos so that's why I ordered this. I needed something that wouldn't let the chips slide off the pan when stacking my nacho ingredients before baking ... works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: SimonSays

customer_reviews.title: Durable for any oven use
customer_reviews.text: Great bakeware. Larger than I expected.. A good thing. Happy with my puro
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not cast Iron.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for. These are pressed and coated, & not cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Got them for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son makes homemade pizzas and loves them. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Best pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly , as usual with Amazon. Best pan ever , my first pizza came out great and didn't stick at all. Just wiped it clean with a paper towel and put it away for next weeks pizza. Highly recommend this , it is heavier steel than I thought it would be. Great !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jethro

customer_reviews.title: Must have for deep dish pizza!
customer_reviews.text: We recently went to a pizza place that served deep dish pizza. My husband was determined to have a deep dish pan after that trip. This pan is the perfect size for a deep dish pizza and is of high quality. It was heavy enough not to warp but light enough that it wasn't hard to get out of the oven. This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Tyree

customer_reviews.title: great for deep dish pizzas
customer_reviews.text: used this multiple times and love it, bakes evenly and so easy to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very difficult time finding a deep dish pizza pan! I have only made two pizzas in this, but both have come out evenly baked. The pan does not warp in the oven (I've had this experience in the past) and the pizza slides right out, though I make sure to put a dab of oil in the bottom anyway. I recommend removing the pizza before slicing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dion

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Non-stick Surface
customer_reviews.text: This pan is huge! And the non-stick surface is great. I have used it several times. Cleans up easily and metal thickness seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: My Thoughts Only

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great deep dish pizza
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice now and both times my pizza has come out cooked perfectly and slides right out of the pan. I prefer to take the pizza out of the pan and put it on a cutting board so that I do not scratch the non stick surface. Now my family can enjoy deep dish pizza without going to Chicago. I'm glad I bought this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Deep dish dream
customer_reviews.text: Yes please! Best deep pan I’ve ever owned. Heat distribution is very even and what a breeze to clean! If you like to make deep dish pizza this is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shipping speed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal we found on Amazon in a while... These are making pizza as we speak! Thank!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have made Chicago style deep dish pizza several times with this pan now and it has never disappointed us. The pizzas slide right out-just lift part of it with a spatula, and it comes right out. We have been using the crust recipe from the Fleischmann's yeast web page and it is the perfect fit for this pan.
customer_reviews.author: DawnM

customer_reviews.title: Love my pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the oven for my deep dish home made pizza
customer_reviews.author: RITA DEHORTA

customer_reviews.title: Yummy stuffed pizza!
customer_reviews.text: Made a Chicago style stuffed pizza and it came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Baja

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Makes great pan pizza but you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Makes great pan pizza but you have to watch the time as it cooks faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Zuleika Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, bought two for a party that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, bought two for a party that was i hosting to make deep dish pizzas. No sticking and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Spman

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza pan ever
customer_reviews.text: These pans are awesome,! I use these pans at least once a week to make pizza my family loves homemade pizza night . I bought 2 well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now and the pizza is fantastic. Home made with a pizza parlor taste! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SC LIPIRA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drip pan for my Kamado Joe.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a drip pan on my Kamado Joe Classic II. It's a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Juan G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Pan for making chi town deep dish pizza.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I needed a larger pan to share my deep dish pizza with my family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Julio1224

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza pan ever
customer_reviews.text: This pizza pan is the best for making deep dish pizza. It truly is non-stick and the dark color contribute to a well-browned crust.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: When making a deep dish pizza, this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P. Fay

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PIZZA
customer_reviews.text: Makes amazing deep dish pizza,I am extremely pleased.The pizza turns out delicious.Don't do what I did however,and put it in the dishwasher(which you're NOT supposed to do anyhow)as it will be very spotty.It still works as good though.LOVE IT.Will order another.
customer_reviews.author: JaCee

customer_reviews.title: ... this in a fire pit and it's held up great. I'm sure this would last forever if used ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually used this in a fire pit and it's held up great. I'm sure this would last forever if used for what it's meant for lol!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just started making stuffed pizza and this pan is awesome! I just wouldn't put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KPScent

customer_reviews.title: Solid And Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice solid nonstick pan that can be used for pizza or anything else. It cleans very easily. We used it in our new wood fired pizza oven and it was perfect. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Kinda big
customer_reviews.text: This size was really too big and I should have looked for at least 2inch deep. The pan itself is great, just not what I wanted for my deep dish pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Loriz

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan has taken my pizza making to a whole new level. I have two pizza "pans" with the holes in them. Wonder whoever thought it was a good idea to put holes in a pizza pan. This pan makes my homemade crust nice and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Pan
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this item. Heavy gauge construction feels very solid and the non stick is great. Easy to clean up after multiple uses and finish showing no signs of chipping or peeling.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Great deep dish pan
customer_reviews.text: My son and I made some excellent Chicago style deep dish pizza with this pan. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Profitt

customer_reviews.title: ... ruined my first one) and once again I'm quite happy. Durable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying (my fault since I ruined my first one) and once again I'm quite happy. Durable and does the job. I use it for a cookie cake and love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for focaccia
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Use it solely to make focaccia. I don’t wash it only wipe it dry. Bottom comes out perfect. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Leelou

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine pizza pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine pizza pan! Although other reviewers have stated they cut their pizzas in the pan, I slide it out on the counter top and slice it up. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great pan at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick, deep dish pan. I've used it twice so far to make Chicago style pizzas. Pan cooked the pizzas perfectly and allowed the crust to crisp up just right. Pan seems durable, like it will last for a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Kward

customer_reviews.title: The Non Stick Works So well its hard to cut the pizza
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I never thought I would actually complain about a product that worked too well. However, I am use to a pan where the pizza sticks to the pan enough to allow easy cutting. The non stick coating works so well on this pan that the pizza slides around while I am trying to cut it. At least it works as advertised. The pan seems durable and has held up to several dishwasher cycles. I am overall extremely happy with the purchase. Now I just have to buy something to hold the pizza in place.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Deep Dish Excellence!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend and he really loves it. Its the perfect size and makes the perfect deep dish pizza, no burning or anything. Quality is good and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for making Chicago style deep dish pizza. My family loved the Giordano style pizza I made. Can't wait tip pizza night to do it again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan. It makes the best deep dish style pizza. I've even loaned it to other family members to use. Clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deep or just regular pizza, browns, doesn't burn
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it so much for the deep aspect, but like having a wall to push the crust against on the edges. REally a nice pan, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: NelleTex

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother, and I have helped him make several awesome deep dish pizzas. My only regret is that I didn't also buy a pan gripper and pie server. Getting a heavy pizza out of the pan can be a challenge. Excellent product, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Beefy Pizza Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly became my "go to" pizza pan! Super beefy/durable and the nonstick surface is great!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Buhoveckey

customer_reviews.title: Pan scratches too easily.
customer_reviews.text: The pan is nice, but it scratches too easily. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Texascook

customer_reviews.title: Good for thick pizza crust.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. It did great she said - really liked it...
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great pan if you like Chicago pizza
customer_reviews.text: Great pan if you like Chicago pizza! You could actually use is for regular pizza but it's especially made for large crust pizza. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi VanD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Well made and formed. I use this for a drip pan and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Terryo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan which I use regularly to make deep dish pizzas. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: makes great pizza!
customer_reviews.text: cooks great and is very easy to scoop the whole pie out of the pan after waiting about 10 minutes after it came out of the oven
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives baked goods a nice bottom crust
customer_reviews.text: For pizza and so much more! Gives baked goods a nice bottom crust. I use it a lot; I bake a lot.
customer_reviews.author: al dente'

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: Worked great ! Non stick finish is great (still used some olive oil).
customer_reviews.author: sergio lopresti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan for use on the Big Green Egg and high oven temps.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pan without handles that could withstand the high temps needed to make a heavy crust Connecticut style pizza. This pan is everything I hoped for. It works great in the medium size BGE. I season the pan each time by using Crisco at 500° for about 10 minutes. Wipe it clean, let it cool and re-season. The pan is non stick and I am able to use a plastic spatula to remove the pizza. I just tilt the pan a bit with the spatula and it slides right out onto a cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Great Deep Dish Pizza Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love deep dish pizza and this is exactly what I need! I have had it for about a year now and it has held up great no signs of wear and tear yet. Just be careful not to use abrasive sponges when you clean it. My favorite pan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for authentic Chicago pizza
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pan. Have made multiple Chicago style pizzas already and each has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best pizza in our area uses pans and the sides of the crust brown better. 12 inch would fit the frozen dough I buy at the mkt.
customer_reviews.author: coolchip

customer_reviews.title: Love this deep dish pizza pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza pan. I use it all the time and the pizza cooks evenly and slides right out of the pan.

customer_reviews.title: Great item, easy to clean.  We bake a lot, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, looking to buy smaller items of same quality!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pan works great I used it to make Chicago-style pizza

customer_reviews.text: Good pizza pan, quite large but not a problem to make a smaller pizza in if you wish

customer_reviews.text: Great! BUT! Don't use your pizza knife on these and dish-wash it after.

customer_reviews.title: nice pan
customer_reviews.text: only used it once so far but pizza cooked great and slid out easily

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This helps make a wonderful deep dish pizza. Used the recipe and the pizza was very good. Would get another one if we needed it.

customer_reviews.title: I mean. It's a pan. It does what ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean. It's a pan. It does what it needs to do perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good for pizza cake or focaccia ,farinata
customer_reviews.text: So far i dint use it ,but i think it will be great the day i try it

customer_reviews.title: Wow - great pizza!!
customer_reviews.text: This pan works great for making deep dish pizzas - I couldn't be happier with the result! Would definitely recommend to anyone who likes to make pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Chicago Metallic Deep Dish Pizza Pan, 14-Inch diameter
product_meta.description: Size:14-Inch diameter"The Chicago Metallic Professional Non-Stick Deep Dish Pizza Pan features heavy duty, carbon steel construction for durability and strength. This pan is designed with a non-stick, easy release for ease in baking and cleaning. The pizza pan measures 14-Inch diameter by 1-1/2-Inch. Dishwasher safe, however hand-washing is recommended to extend product life. Oven safe to 450°F / 232°C; not intended to be used under the broiler. Sharp-edged utensils and knives should not be used. At Chicago Metallic, we believe that serious baking requires serious bakeware. That’s why we’ve been crafting innovative equipment, for professionals and serious home bakers, for over 100 years. We’ve built a global reputation one kitchen at a time. People know our products are built for durability and can be depended on year after year. We’re proud to offer three distinct lines of premium bakeware plus stylish, innovative specialty bakeware and baking essentials. The Chicago Metallic Professional line of bakeware makes cooking and baking a delight. The non-stick surface easily releases each recipe and makes clean-up effortless. It’s the preferred choice of bakers who understand quality and design, but also want professional-grade durability."
feature_bullets: PERFECT CHICAGO STYLE DEEP DISH PIZZA: The Chicago Metallic Deep Dish Pizza Pan makes it possible to create that perfect 'Chicago-Style' deep dish pizza, cookie pie or stuffed pizza at home in your own oven.
DURABLE AND STRONG: The Chicago Metallic Deep Dish Pizza Pan is made from heavy-duty carbon steel for strength and durability
NON-STICK BAKEWARE: Chicago Metallic Bakeware features an easy release surface and is silicone based. There is a non-stick coating for ease of baking and clean up.
EASY TO CLEAN: This deep dish pizza pan is dishwasher safe, making clean up quick and easy. Hand-washing is recommended to extend the product life.
MEASUREMENTS: The pizza pan measures 14" in diameter x 1.5" high.
